Excellent, small restaurant for tapas!  Everything I got off the menu was good and came out quick.  Their signature "Las Bombas"  were the best...a friend potato ball, cut in half and drizzled in a delicious sauce.  It gets crowded at night, so stick to lunch.  Most of the waiters dont speak English, but you will get by with their translated menu.  I actually went every day I was in Barcelona for a snack.
